channel.title: [PI] Look Please Help Well REPP ++
channel.description:
So I just added the RFD chest. And it has 3 options "Bank" "Buy Food" and "Buy Items" how do I make a case for each invidual option? Like in action handler I can only make it do one thing not 3. How do I set it to [b]c.getPA().openUpBank();[/b] but at the same time open [b]c.getShops().openShop(1);[/b] and [b]c.getShops().openShop(2);[/b]
[IMG]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/37/serverhelp.png[/img]
Please help

item.title: [PI] Look Please Help Well REPP ++
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Actionhandler:

firstclickobject:

case #:
c.getPA().openUpBank();
break;

secondclickobject:

case #:
c.getShops().openShop(1);
break;

thirdclickobject:

case #:
c.getShops().openShop(2);
break;

Read full topic

@ezzi wrote:

I might be wrong but if you can get the case ID for each one you can do it like that. for example the first one could be like…
case ##:
c.getPA().openUpBank();
break;
and so forth
But I like your ideea might try to manipulate that!
